Wofblade::

She had to endure hit taunting but she didn't have to like it. While 
he moved her back and forth, she could feel her hands coming back on 
line. She growled but played as thought she couldn't even move her 
optics if she wanted to. "You know, your good. Your very good. 
However, you don't have to rub it in."  She frowned a bit and wished 
her body would recover faster. She grumbled, "Great, and if I was 
around when you and your brother were together, who knows if I'd 
still be functioning or not. i don't think I'd survive. Not the way 
you mix drinks."  She kept swaying as he moved her back and forth. 
She felt her legs come on line. She she waited just a second to run a 
quick internal diognostic. She was about 50 %.  She decided to use 
what she had. She stood up as quickly as possible. She turned and 
leaned on the back of the chair. She kissed Malice on the nose and 
then walked/hobbled/limped out towards the mess hall door. "You too 
can learn a few things Oh great Sarcastic One." as she walked out 
into the hallway.  She stopped just outside the door and leaned 
against the wall. "Sheesh, note to self, don't drink with that bot 
again," under her breath. 






--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice began to chuckle softly.  Then it got louder, and loude, 
until it sounded a lot like Megatron, the Leader of the Decepticons.  
One could easily confuse Malice for Megatron.  
>  
> He had to admit, she played her act extremly well.
> "Oh you don't mean that, now do you?  You're just mad I caught on 
to you so quickly.  At least I didn't throw you into stasis lock and 
do something bad to you."
> He let loose another manical laugh, before stepping out from behind 
the counter.  He stood behind Wolfblade, taking her shoulders in his 
big hands and gently tossed her back and forth in between his hands.  
> "Your a good Maximal or Maxitron or whatever, too bad you were not 
online when me and my brother came online.  You'd be a real riot!   
Oh well, live and learn.  Well at least you should learned a lesson 
from this."
> 
> shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> OOC: Sorry I haven't posted lately. Just got out of the hospital. 
But 
> I'm feeling much better now. 
> 
> IC:
> Wolfblade:
> She took the drink and downed it. She didn't budge. Didn't even 
> twitch. However, she couldn't move to save her life. She smiled 
> slightly and looked at him. He was spiking her drinks and she was 
> just now realizing it. She was mad at him for now her motor skills 
> went into stasis for a  bit. She took a deep breath and looked at 
> him. "Malice, I like you. You are a good comrad in arms. However, 
you 
> ever...and I mean EVER do that again, and once I can move again 
I'll 
> terminate your programs perminantely." She couldn't help but 
chuckle. 
> He got the better side of her and she was more frustrated at 
herself 
> for letting her guard down.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
> "I am Des Wraith, the Archfiend of Flames.  I have slaughtered 
thousands of demons who opposed me and will keep doing so.  And not 
even the great King of All Demons can stop my awesome wrath!"
